    Description
    BallFactory
    Creates and manages the cue ball and object balls for the pool table.
    GameTuning
    Contains global tuning constants for the pool minigame physics.
    PocketContactSystem
    Detects and handles collisions between pool balls and pocket sensors.
    PocketContactSystem.Listener
    Listener for pocket events.
    PoolWorld
    Wrapper around a Box2D World used by the pool minigame.
    TableBuilder
    Responsible for constructing the physical boundaries of the pool table, including rails and pocket sensors.
    TableConfig
    Defines the physical dimensions and scale factors for the pool table setup.
    TableConfig.Builder
    Fluent builder for constructing immutable TableConfig instances.
    TableSpace
    Provides utility methods for converting between world-space and normalised table-space coordinates.
